archimate:RealizationRelationship.documentation:
The security architecture review service has ease of use as a primary consideration.
Theres the question guide - which makes it easy to understand each question The question form - Every question can be answered yes, no or partially. and scoring is based on that. the question criteria also exist in the guide The level one review is only 5 questions. The level two review is 28 questions, but includes a mechanism where the security architecture team helps
